title: Where can I buy the Rialto font?
content:
hi,

I would like to buy the Rialto font (dfType) from Giovanni de Faccio and Lui Karner. Does anybody know where i can buy it? I can't find any sites in the web selling this font...

sorry for my english

thanks

thais
author: thaisvilanova

comments.content:
Hello Thais,

here is the adress of dfType:

Karner & Stefan OEG  
Großmaierhof 15  
3242 Texing  
AUSTRIA

The e-mail adress is:

[rialto@fischbachpresse.at](mailto:rialto@fischbachpresse.at)

Best wishes,  
Th. Kunz  
[[http://www.ABCdarium.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013004410/http:/www.abcdarium.de/) ]

hi, Thomas,

thanks a lot for your help.

thais
